Label.en: Here are a few of the leading ones... take your time to zoom in and look at them closely!
Label.fr: Voici quelques-un des principaux...prend le temps de zoomer pour comprendre !
Label.es: Here are a few of the leading ones... take your time to zoom in and look at them closely!
Label.zh: Here are a few of the leading ones... take your time to zoom in and look at them closely!

Label.en: Personally, I like the first one... with the parking lot on the roof. It's perfect for a bird like me
Label.fr: J'aime assez le premier avec le parking sur le toi. Je me verrais bien atterir là pour ma pause café.
